comment: The IE CSI-RS-ResourceMapping is used to
configure the resource element mapping of a CSI-RS resource in time- and frequency domain

frequencyDomainAllocation.comment: row: 1 - 5, support num of ports 1,2,4 only

comment: Only multiples of 4 are allowed, If the configured value is larger than the width of the
corresponding BWP, the UE shall assume that the actual CSI-RS bandwidth is equal to the width of BWP
scramblingID defines scrambling ID of CSI-RS with length of 10 bits
